extension.disclaimer: Developed in Kodi Jarvis. Should work on Kodi Gotham and up.
extension.description:
Multi-emulator front-end for Kodi. Includes offline scrapers for MAME and No-Intro ROMs and allows to scrape information, thumb and fanart online. ROM auditing for No-Intro ROMs using No-Intro XML DATs.
Launching of games and standalone applications is also supported.
